20101226191500.000|20101226191502.000|TR0|that the departure boards at the airports 
20101226191502.000|20101226191505.000|TR0|don't tell the truth.  They haven't told 
20101226191505.000|20101226191507.000|TR0|the truth in years.  They only reflect 
20101226191507.000|20101226191510.000|TR0|what's scheduled to leave on time.  The 
20101226191510.000|20101226191512.000|TR0|real key here is where your plane, your 
20101226191512.000|20101226191515.000|TR0|actual aircraft is.  It has nothing to do 
20101226191515.000|20101226191517.000|TR0|with weather where you are.  It has to do 
20101226191517.000|20101226191520.000|TR0|with the weather where the airplane is 
20101226191520.000|20101226191522.000|TR0|that's coming to get you.  If you don't
